thread.title: DIY blogger creates 'elevator' bed for tight space | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: DIY blogger creates 'elevator' bed for tight space | Daily Mail Online

author: Jennifer Smith For Dailymail.Com
title: DIY blogger creates 'elevator' bed for tight space | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad A house within a house: Crafty DIY blogger makes space in her tiny home with a moving 'elevator' bed and a wardrobe that doubles as a shower Alaskan DIY blogger Ana White designed the bespoke tiny home for a client who wanted a spacious feel The home has two full beds, one of which lowers from the ceiling like an elevator on an electric platform Ana used a garage door lift and sliding door frames to construct the bed and its frame for $500 It is controlled from a switch on the wall above the sectional sofa which serves as a guest bed when made up Published: 21:54 GMT, 19 February 2017 | Updated: 22:15 GMT, 19 February 2017 29 shares
